website_summaries.verdict: This rugged cymbal backpack from Gator provides both protection and hands-free transportation.
pros: Nylon exterior with thick padded sides and reinforced bottom
Features a large front pocket plus three additional storage pockets
cons: Shoulder straps tend to slip and occasionally fail

customer_reviews.title: Good cymbal bag
customer_reviews.text: This cymbal bag has enough space for all my cymbals, from an 8" splash all the way up to a 21" ride. Its outside pocket is useful for extras like cymbal washers, felts, sleeves, and so forth. The sling strap makes carrying it pretty easy, but if you carry it slung on your back, be careful going through doorways.
customer_reviews.author: T. Anschutz

customer_reviews.title: Really, really wanted to like this. Just won't hold up
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the first case because the strap tore at the seam the first time I used it. The second one I got tore the third time I used it....in the exact same spot. The straps aren't heavy duty enough to wear on your back, that's where they tear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Want to keep your precious cymbals safe and sound on the road? Take a look at this case!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a solid, reliable travel case for your high-dollar cymbals, this is the best soft-sided option I have found. Yes, a hard case is, well, a hard case, but this one has treated me well and I haven't damaged anything in over a year of use. I play Zildjian A's, so, if you know cymbals, I wasn't about to get something flimsy. The main material is pretty bomber and the stitching and handles are NOT coming off, even under heavy touring use. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Smyrl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So glad I got this, way better than you could imagine! A for sure buy if you want your cymbals proctected
customer_reviews.author: Yard quantum

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag with space for all your cymbals
customer_reviews.text: Great space and pockets. I have a problem with the fasteners breaking. I've fixed one twice already. Maybe the fasteners aren't made for the weight of a fully loaded bag? Not sure, but aside from that, it's a really nice product.
customer_reviews.author: R San Agustin

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made and rapid Delivery!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Son who is a Drummer and he said this bag is well made and Gator Gear is the Best!! So far so good. This gear bag seems to do the job for storing Cybele's and has a side pocket large enough to store drum sticks and more.
customer_reviews.author: Blackorchid1960

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bag for cymbals
customer_reviews.text: Amazing travel bag for all your cymbals!!! Well worth the price, and I know it will last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: G-Lo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, very durable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son in drumline. He stuffs all kinds of things in it - water bottles, snacks, books, clothing. It takes a serious beating during drumline season, and he loves it. Perfect size, very durable.
customer_reviews.author: R.L. Flickinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: Excellent so far! I've used it a few months I play 4 or 5 times a week and usually carry 14" hi hats, 3 20" cymbals 2 22" cymbals, and a 20" China. It seems very sturdy. Plenty of space for stick bag and lots of other stuff... Towels, hurst clutch, a few tools, sone bells, etc. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: musicgeek

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great for regular giggers
customer_reviews.text: Shoulder straps are comfy, and I like having the ability to bring just my stickbag and cymbals for sit-in gigs. Dividers and interior is not best quality, but by no means shoddy. I have a Gator hardware bag too, and the great quality of canvas and stitching across both is consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Jon A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to our son. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Aletta

customer_reviews.title: Gator rocks
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and it was great. My drummer loved it. It is really thick with a huge pocket area. Actually, the whole thing was Huge, but he uses a lot of cymbals and different percussion stuff too so it worked well for him. The Zippers were working great too. Definitely a quality buy.
customer_reviews.author: dstroud

customer_reviews.title: All purpose
customer_reviews.text: I have a few cymbals that I use. I keep most in a cymbal safe while in storage. When I do gigs I use this bag. It works perfect for me. It has solid straps for carrying. It also has a back pack type option. It frees up my other hands when I'm moving other drums and stuff. The bag interior has separate slots for cymbals.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fay

customer_reviews.title: Interior and dividers could be a little better, but having a cymbal bag as a backpack ...
customer_reviews.text: Interior and dividers could be a little better, but having a cymbal bag as a backpack is a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: MattyB

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I hope it iS as resistant as it looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME CASE!!!
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME case with tons of padding. Best case I've bought in my 35 years of playing road gigs.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Sue

customer_reviews.title: Better than average.
customer_reviews.text: Being as leather cymbal bags are impossibly expensive and being as vinyl bags wear out, and being as light weight bags can't handle any amount of cymbals this bag seemed to offer the best balance of durability and cost. If you can afford an all leather bag then buy it. It will last a lifetime but this, I am convinced, is the next best thing. My son just took this bag loaded with cymbals on a two week tour of Italy with his college jazz band. It held up great and the backpack straps made airports a breeze....except every security and customers agent made him open it up for inspection.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable on my back too
customer_reviews.text: Everything as promised. Durable and we designed. Comfortable on my back too, freed up hands.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sevigny

customer_reviews.title: Just the product i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is exactly what I needed. Its lightweight, durable, well padded, and has a ton of dividers on the inside. It also has extra pockets and pouches for stick bags and other gear and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: for the price it's great, and it's been durable enough for gig use
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: falling apart after only a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag in July 2020 and have only used a few times (not many gigs during covid!). The handle is falling apart. I am a bit surprised because the bag does seem to be well constructed and was certainly not inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and built like a tank
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This bag is killer. Heavy duty zippers, straps, and reinforced bottom. The pocket on the front is huge, big enough to hold a stick bag. There are 3 other smaller front pockets, too. The interior dividers are pretty stiff, and they're attached to the inside so they don't get bunched up. The shoulder strap is nice and padded. (I don't use the back pack straps, but they're heavy duty, too). My last cymbal bag was a Sabian Bac Pac that lasted 12 years before the seams started to rip. I expect this one will last even longer. I can't imagine a better cymbal bag for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect bag for gigging locally
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bag for gigging locally. I carry a 22" ride, 17and 18 inch crash, 14" hi hats, and a 10' splash. There's plenty of room for more if you need it. The storage on the front is great for sticks, or anything else you need to carry. I've had mine for awhile and was so impressed with the quality that I just ordered the drum cases to match this. They are also a good investment in my drums.
customer_reviews.author: PapawBK

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to replace a zildjian bag that fell apart.  Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the zildjian bag with shoulder straps. The zipper and front hi-hat compartment fell apart after two weekends. So I bought this as a replacement. Great bag! I love that it's front compartment holds my stick bag. Lots of interior dividers for all 8 of my cymbals. very tough. I'm very happy with it. You will be too! 2/6/17 Still going strong! Awesome bag.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron E. Boule

product_meta.title: Gator Cases Protechtor Series Cymbal Backpack; Holds Cymbals Up to 24" Diameter (GP-CYMBAK-24)
product_meta.description:
Size:24" Backpack

The Gator Cases GP-CYMBAK-24 24” cymbal back pack is designed to provide much needed protection to cymbals between gigs. The Cymbal bag is designed to fit cymbals up to 24” in diameter. Interior dividers prevent the cymbals from rubbing against each other and causing scratches and other damage. The exterior is made of durable 600-Denier nylon and thick padded main sides with a reinforced bottom. The cymbal back pack also has 3 storage pockets for drum keys and other accessories including one generously large storage pocket that can accommodate a stick bag. The awesome features don’t stop there! The back pack has thick back padding for added comfort as well as two thick padded adjustable back pack straps. The cymbal bag also comes with a shoulder strap and a neoprene wrapped carry handle providing ultimate comfort.

The GP-CYMBAK Series cymbal back pack is available in a 22” (GP-CYMBAK-22) and 24” model. The GP-CYMBAK-24 interior dimensions are 25” X 25” X 4” and fits popular brands of cymbals such as Zildjian, Meinl, Paste, Sabian and many other cymbal manufacturers.

Gator Cases is known for manufacturing innovative products designed to protect! We offer a wide range of available sizes, materials, and protection levels, for all types of instruments and gear including Frameworks stands, Rackworks install racks and accessories, and Protechtor drum cases. It isn’t hard to find a great reason why Gator should be the brand you trust to protect your equipment for life!
feature_bullets: Large front pocket to hold your loaded stickbag

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
